channel.title: Interpretable Deep Networks on
channel.description: Recent content in Interpretable Deep Networks on

item.title: Catching Up
item.description: Today, I received an email from an old college friend who asked about GPT models, RLHF, AI safety, and the new ChatGPT plug-in model. A lot has been happening in the past few years, so here is a bit of a crash course on the current state of the large language model world.

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Welcome to The Visible Net, a blogging outlet for the “East-Coast Contingent” of mechanistic interpretability machine intelligence researchers. And some introductions, from David Bau.
